keywords: ['amateur recording', 'rock music', 'instrumental', 'electric guitar', 'guitar solo', 'bass guitar', 'piano', 'acoustic drums', 'groovy', 'hard', 'raw']
caption: This is an amateur recording of a guitar solo for a rock music piece. The solo is being played on an overdriven electric guitar while the piano and the bass guitar in the backing track play the main tune. There is a 6/8 rock beat played on the acoustic drums for the rhythm section. There is a raw feel to it. The piece can be used to gather electric guitar samples to be used in beat-making.
